original_title: K 11: Confessions of a Sex Tourist
overview: K11 - synonym for a known mecca of prostitution in Cambodia, shows the perpetrator's side of sex tourism. Unaware of the hidden camera a 44-year old businessman openly talks about his tricks to lure young girls into his hotel, while he ridicules new international laws that protect young sex workers.
title: K 11: Confessions of a Sex Tourist
